title: Combine GM Interviews + TE & OL Preview
itunes:title: Combine GM Interviews + TE & OL Preview
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a special new episode from the 2020 NFL Scouting Combine. To start off, the guys react to the news of LSU QB Joe Burrow having small hands after they were measured (1:50). Next, the pair talk with Miami Dolphins GM Chris Grier as the Dolphins have a ton of picks in the draft this year (4:50). After that, the duo speak with Indianapolis Colts GM Chris Ballard about his philosophy on building a team (17:18). Then, the guys preview the top tight end prospects at the combine (29:07). Next, the pair look at the best offensive tackle prospects at the combine (31:28). To wrap up the show, the guys talk about the best interior offensive linemen here (34:36).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
